author: dws
msg: rpm/fedora-1/subversion.spec : Don't mess with the svn_version.h file.  This
causes one of the tests to fail.  This fixes a problem with building the

author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, make a first stab at implementing
DSO-loading in the FS loader library and at fixing the build system
not to assume that the FS library depends on BDB.
Replace fs_libdir with bdb_libdir; remove fs_bindir.
Replace INSTALL_FS_LIB with INSTALL_BDB_LIB; remove INSTALL_FS_BIN.
Move everything from fs-bin into bin and from fs-lib into lib.
Add [fs-libs] thingie (a la ra-libs) and make [libsvn_fs] use it.
Use add-deps in [libsvn_fs] as it's used in [libsvn_ra].
Move BDB-specific tests from fs-test to bdb-test.
Only conditionalize bdb-lib, bdb-test, and install-bdb-lib rules
Reorganize the non-DSO linking section so that ra_local is
unconditional, and add in stuff for the FS modules.
(GeneratorBase): If type isn't found, there's a good chance that it
was just missing.  So don't try to include it in the error message;
(write_symbols): Handle FS modules as well as RA modules.
(fs_modules): New table to store FS type definitions.
(load_vtable): New function to dynamically load a vtable.
(get_library_vtable): Use table and loader to produce vtable,
instead of the cheesy if/else-if construct.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Overwrite libsvnjavahl-1.jnilib on Darwin if it already exists.
* configure.in: Force overwrite of libsvnjavahl-1.jnilib by passing 'f' to ln.

author: jpieper
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch do the symbol rename dance for
libsvn_fs_fs just like it was done in r9533 for libsvn_fs_base.
- Type names and constants lose the svn_fs__ prefix
- Remove functions that were thin wrappers around the svn_fs__fs_*
ones, as they now cause namespace conflicts

author: ghudson
msg: In the fs-abstraction branch, hide the FSAP concept from the caller by
having svn_fs_create look for an FS type rather than an FSAP name.
The loader library will be responsible for performing any necessary
translation; for now, that means mapping the "bdb" FS type to the
(get_library_vtable): Operate on an FS type, not an FSAP name.
Return an error on unrecognized FS types.
* svnadmin/main.c (subcommand_create): Just set the FS type in the
